title: Help can anybody tell me what this is?
content:
Need to re-create this for embroidery and just can not find the font. Anyone have any ideas? Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Capture.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113818/http:/typophile.com/files/Capture_18.JPG) | 12.87 KB |
author: jerseybean85

comments.content:
|Removals| is Sandoval Speed:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/sandoval/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113818/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/sandoval/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/sandoval/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113818im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SandovalSpeed_3703.png)

|STAR| appears to be custom, but you could recreate the look with something like Europa Grotesk No. 2 Extra Bold Italic:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/europa-grotesk-no-2-sh/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113818/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/europa-grotesk-no-2-sh/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/europa-grotesk-no-2-sh/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113818im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Europa_6134.png)
